feature: Enhance loading state with skeleton placeholders
description: Replace the simple spinner loading state with a skeleton UI that mirrors the page structure for better perceived performance

phases.name: Create Reusable Skeleton Component
phases.description: Build a flexible Skeleton component that can be composed for different layouts

subtasks.title: Create base Skeleton component
subtasks.description: Create web/components/ui/skeleton.tsx with base Skeleton component using Tailwind animate-pulse. Support variants: text, circular, rectangular with configurable width/height. Follow existing tools/[slug]/loading.tsx patterns (bg-slate-800/50 animate-pulse).
subtasks.notes: Created web/components/ui/skeleton.tsx with base Skeleton component following existing UI component patterns. Supports three variants (text, circular, rectangular) with configurable width/height. Uses bg-slate-800/50 animate-pulse for consistency with existing loading states.

subtasks.title: Export Skeleton from UI index
subtasks.description: Check if there's a UI barrel export and add Skeleton if so. Otherwise, component will be imported directly.
subtasks.notes: Verified that no UI barrel export (index.ts) exists in web/components/ui/. Confirmed the project pattern: UI components are imported directly from their individual files (e.g., from "@/components/ui/skeleton"). No action needed - Skeleton component will be imported directly following existing project conventions.

phases.name: Create Section Skeletons
phases.description: Build skeleton components that mirror each page section

subtasks.title: Create HeroSkeleton component
subtasks.description: Create web/components/skeletons/hero-skeleton.tsx mirroring PillarHero structure: full-screen container, centered badge placeholder, large headline placeholder (2 lines), subheadline placeholder (2 lines), CTA button placeholder, and scroll indicator placeholder.

subtasks.title: Create BentoToolsSkeleton component
subtasks.description: Create web/components/skeletons/bento-tools-skeleton.tsx mirroring BentoToolsSection: section header (badge, title, subtitle), category headers, and grid of 6-8 tool card placeholders with icon, title, description, and badge areas.

subtasks.title: Create remaining section skeletons
subtasks.description: Create lightweight skeleton components for ToolChains, Install, OriginStory, Waitlist, and Footer sections. These can be simpler as they're below the fold. Store in web/components/skeletons/.

phases.name: Update Loading Components
phases.description: Replace spinner loading states with skeleton implementations

subtasks.title: Update main app loading.tsx
subtasks.description: Replace spinner in web/app/loading.tsx with composed skeleton layout: HeroSkeleton (above fold priority), followed by partial BentoToolsSkeleton. Use same bg-[hsl(var(--surface-dark))] background as main page.

subtasks.title: Create skeleton barrel export
subtasks.description: Create web/components/skeletons/index.ts to export all skeleton components for clean imports.

subtasks.title: Manual visual testing
subtasks.description: Run dev server and verify: 1) Skeleton renders without errors, 2) Layout matches page structure, 3) Animation is smooth, 4) Responsive on mobile/tablet. Document findings in build-progress.txt.

subtasks.title: Build verification
subtasks.description: Run 'npm run build' in web directory to verify TypeScript compiles and no build errors. Fix any issues found.

final_acceptance: Skeleton loading state renders instead of spinner
Layout mirrors actual page structure (Hero, Tools section)
notes: Reference pattern: web/app/tools/[slug]/loading.tsx already has excellent skeleton implementation
Use Tailwind animate-pulse with bg-slate-800/50 for consistency
Focus on above-the-fold content (Hero, BentoTools header) for best perceived performance
CSS variables use hsl() format: hsl(var(--surface-dark)), hsl(var(--brand-primary))
